alert.note: Alert for Elk; McKean (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:24PM EDT until August 12 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Elk County in north central Pennsylvania... Southern McKean County in north central Pennsylvania... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 222 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ludlow, moving east southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Kane, Smethport, Wetmore, Wilcox, James City, Ludlow, East Branch Dam, Westline, Kinzua Bridge State Park, Crosby, Mount Jewett and Bradford Airport. Radar has indicated rotation within this severe thunderstorm. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, tornadoes can develop quickly during severe thunderstorms. This includes the following highways... Route 6 from near Ludlow to east of Smethport. Route 219 from Wilcox to near the Bradford Regional Airport. State Road 46 near Smethport. State Road 59 from the Bradford Regional Airport to Smethport. State Road 66 from James City to Kane. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in State College PA. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, they can develop quickly during severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado, act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure such as a basement or small interior room. This severe thunderstorm may cause serious injury and significant property damage. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for north central Pennsylvania.
